devdoc.author: Victor Gillibert
devdoc.details: Improvement to do :Allow not only USDC and create functions to handle tokens authorized Allow to modify leverage See if oracle price works better on mainnet

decreasePosition(address,uint256,bool).details: USDC only -> see if on public net better to use oracle -> // (,int price,,,) = AggregatorV3Interface(0x5f4eC3Df9cbd43714FE2740f5E3616155c5b8419).latestRoundData();

params.isLong: true for Long, False for Short

increasePosition(uint256,bool).details: USDC only -> see if on public net better to use oracle -> // (,int price,,,) = AggregatorV3Interface(0x5f4eC3Df9cbd43714FE2740f5E3616155c5b8419).latestRoundData();

params.isLong: true for Long, False for Short

liquidatePosition(bool).details: USDC only -> see if on public net better to use oracle -> // (,int price,,,) = AggregatorV3Interface(0x5f4eC3Df9cbd43714FE2740f5E3616155c5b8419).latestRoundData();

params.isLong: true for Long, False for Short

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract controlled by the vault that interacts with GMX perpetual exchange on Arbitrum network

decreasePosition(address,uint256,bool).notice: Decrease positions on GMX - only the vault can call this function

increasePosition(uint256,bool).notice: Increase positions on GMX - only the vault can call this function

liquidatePosition(bool).notice: Liquidates positions on GMX - only the vault can call this function

userdoc.notice: This contract should work with any vault on Arbitrum network
